[h1] Nedrilax approves Counter-Strike: Source. [/h1]

This is a necessary texture pack DLC for Garry's Mod required in various workshop maps. Includes a free game with it, a remake of the popular game Counter-Strike 1.6 with improved graphics, physics, and running on the Source engine so that you can give it a shot before loading the content into Garry's Mod.

I have fond memories of playing this game at college on the LAN. Fun times. And not to forget those late night CS: Office runs that used to run into the early hours of the morning. An absolute classic. Still great even in 2021.
